author: newsr.in
title: Wasim Akram appeals Narendra Modi to give green signal to Indo-Pak bilateral series
text: Legendary paceman Wasim Akram on Thursday urged Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to end his country's cricketing boycott of Pakistan saying the ongoing impasse was hurting fans across the globe. Â»
